comments.body: Cool. I take it these changes mean we'll be breaking everyone using `OldDiff`-style `Diff`. Do we have a version of this test with the compat flag on (and `string` constraints), to ensure it still works there?

Yes, we'll break anyone passing some `keyof T` to the old style `Diff`. We don't have a test with the compat flag on. In fact, we ought to run *all* tests both with and without the compat flag. But I'm already tired of waiting for tests, so I don't want to go there.
Yeah, just copying a test or two (like this one) that we added to check ecosystem compat is useful enough.
